content: this pattern is available for free on my blog here https //menmyhook com/easy-corner-to-corner-granny-scarf-pattern-nain-scarf/ the nain scarf is a beginner scarf pattern featuring the granny stitch and corner to corner technique easy to convert this pattern works up quickly in any colour or yarn terms us type written photo tutorial available on pdf skill beginner easy hook 4mm yarn 1 x sultan deluxe 1000m/1093 yds fingering weight gradient yarn cake or any similar yarn cake or any dk weight yarn in a similar amount of yardage other materials stitch markers darning needle scissors stitches used chains double_crochet me n my hook original crochet pattern due to the nature of digital downloads no refunds are available for this item i am here to help if you have any questions my email and social media contacts are included with each pattern purchase please reach out to me if you have any issues recreating this pattern join my facebook group and share your makes or ask questions here 1 you may sell items you make using this pattern if you sell them online please provide a link back to my shop this pattern is for use by the purchaser only and cannot be sold copied or used for mass production you may not use my photographs thank you bx my website and blog with free patterns tips reviews and more www menmyhook com follow me i share updates photos and occasional giveaways and sales on my social media pages come join the fun https //www facebook com/menmyhook https //www instagram com/menmyhook https //www pinterest co uk/menmyhookb/ 1 https //bit ly/menmyhookersgroup
